tool.name: OGS: editMaterialID
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'editMaterialID'.
tool.command: editMaterialID $replace $condense $specify --mesh-input-file '$mesh_input_file' --mesh-output-file '$mesh_output_file' #if str($current_material_id): --current-material-id '$current_material_id' #end if #if str($new_material_id): --new-material-id '$new_material_id' #end if #if str($element_type): --element-type '$element_type' #end if

param.name: specify
param.label: specify
param.help: specify material IDs by element types (-e)

param.name: mesh_input_file
param.label: mesh input file
param.help: the file containing the input mesh

param.name: mesh_output_file
param.label: mesh output file
param.help: the file the mesh will be written to

param.name: current_material_id
param.label: current material id
param.help: current material id to be replaced

tool.help: This tool runs the **editMaterialID** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
